text: Romà Cuyàs i Sol (24 November 1938 – 27 December 2019), was a Spanish lawyer and sports and cultural executive. He was the President of the Spanish Olympic Committee between 1983 and 1984 and comissioner of the 1992 Olympic Games in Barcelona.Fallece Romà Cuyàs, expresidente del COE y pionero de Barcelona 92 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona
title: Romà Cuyàs i Sol
